info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 6:44PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON...EASTERN SCHENECTADY...SCHOHARIE...WESTERN SCHENECTADY...MONTGOMERY...AND WESTERN ALBANY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 643 PM EST, a snow showers were over St. Johnsville, or 7 miles northwest of Canajoharie moving southeast at 30 MPH. THESE SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR...Canajoharie, Fort Plain, and Ephratah around 650 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 24. Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 29. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
